content.p: Are you thinking of coming to Nottingham to study one of our Health Science courses? Would you like to find out more about them from our staff and current students? Then why not check out our brand new podcast series 'It's Notts just Physio!' Get ready for an immersive experience as we dive into the exciting world of our fantastic school staff and team. This podcast is not just about physioâ€”it's a backstage pass to the vibrant personalities, diverse expertise, and untold stories that make our school an exceptional community. Episodes will cover a range of staff across the school, as well as getting students involved too. To listen to the podcast, follow this link to the series on Spotify. Stay tuned for exciting episodes dropping every couple of weeks. For more information on the courses we offer in Health Sciences, take a look at our web pages and come and visit us at an Open Day School of Health Sciences B310, B Floor, South Block Link Queen's Medical Centre Nottingham, NG7 2UH email: helm@nottingham.ac.uk
